casebody.data:
Second Department,

October, 1960

(October 3, 1960) Rudolph Bunt, Respondent, v. Hofstra College, Appellant.

Motion for a stay pending appeal dismissed as academic, in view of the decision on the appeal in Bunt v. Bofstra College (11 A D 2d 1026). Beldoek, Acting P. J., Ughetta, Kleinfeld, Christ and Brennan, JJ., concur.
